The Playlist Meme

  1. Open up the music player on your computer.

  2. Set it to play your entire music collection.

  3. Hit the ‚Äúshuffle‚Äù command.

  4. Tell us the title of the next ten songs that show up (with their musicians), no matter how embarrassing. That‚Äôs right, no skipping that Carpenters tune that will totally destroy your hip credibility. It‚Äôs time for total musical honesty. You can put the list in the comment thread, or write it up in your blog or journal and then post a link in the comments.

  5. If you get the same artist twice, you may skip the second (or third, or etc.) occurances. You don‚Äôt have to, but since randomness could mean you end up with a list of ten song with five artists, you can if you‚Äôd like.

Here‚Äôs my list:

Kennedy Hopkins Mix - Presidents of the United States of America - Little Blue Dune Buggy

Tom Conlon - Am I In Trouble
